description: This file defines a standard error response model and functions to install global exception handlers in a FastAPI application, providing structured JSON error responses.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a standardized structure for error responses, including code, message, optional details, and request ID.

methods.name: _request_id_from_headers
methods.description: Extracts a request ID from headers if present, for correlation purposes.

methods.name: install_exception_handlers
methods.description: Function that sets up global exception handlers for HTTPException and general Exception in a FastAPI app.
